abstract: United States Golf Assn partners with University of Minnesota for five-year research partnership to study challenges facing sport, such as participation levels and sustainability of game.
lead_paragraph: The move was prompted by concerns about participation levels and the sustainability of the sport.

headline.main: U.S.G.A. Plans Five-Year Study on Challenges Facing Golf

snippet: The move was prompted by concerns about participation levels and the sustainability of the sport.
